channel.title: So far, yet so so close!
channel.description:
[b]So I am at the end of making my new server. With alot of help from yous guys at moparisthebest.com. But as usual one problem still lies at the end. :confused: :mad:
When I go to advertise my server on moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php it always says that it is not online, yet it is.
I have no-ip application ticked and going fine and my server is online 100% yet it does not let me advertise atall.
Please somebody respond and help me. Many Thans. Dillon.[/b]

item.title: So far, yet so so close!
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Aslo if your going to make a commitment to operating a server, I think that a website would be a good idea.

Read full topic
